pack_description: Action cards to spice things up
questions: ACTION: Do your best impression of someone in this room

ACTION: Text your ex 'I miss you' (screenshot for proof)
ACTION: Do 10 push-ups or take a shot
ACTION: Let the group post something on your social media
ACTION: Give the person on your left a compliment on their appearance
ACTION: Show your most embarrassing saved photo
ACTION: Do your best sexy dance for 30 seconds
ACTION: Let someone send a text from your phone
ACTION: Recreate your profile picture pose
ACTION: Call a random contact and sing happy birthday
ACTION: Give someone a lap dance for 30 seconds
ACTION: Let someone draw on you with a marker
ACTION: Act out your last message without words
ACTION: Do your best fake orgasm impression
ACTION: Kiss the person of your choice on the cheek
ACTION: Let someone do your makeup (badly)
ACTION: Take a shot without using your hands
ACTION: Show your DMs with your crush/partner
ACTION: Give a foot massage to someone of group's choice
